  • Constructor Details

    • Bookshelf

      public Bookshelf(double w, double h, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      COnstructor of the class that sets also the animation for tiles when they are inserted in the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      w - width of the bookshelf
      h - height of the bookshelf
      primaryStage - stage where the bookshelf is displayed

  • Method Details

    • reconnectPlaceTiles

      public void reconnectPlaceTiles(Map<String,String> map, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      It places the tiles in the bookshelf when the player reconnects
      Parameters:
      map - map representing the bookshelf of the player
      primaryStage - stage where the bookshelf is displayed

    • insert

      public void insert(ArrayList<javafx.scene.Node> nodeList, int col)
      It inserts the tiles into the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      nodeList - array of nodes representing the tiles
      col - column where the tiles are inserted

    • update

      public void update(ArrayList<javafx.scene.Node> nodeList, int cols)
      It updates the bookshelves of the other players
      Parameters:
      nodeList - array of nodes representing the tiles
      cols - column where the tiles are placed

    • createLabelName

      public void createLabelName(double w, double h, double x, double y)
      It creates the label for the name
      Parameters:
      w - width of the label
      h - height of the label
      x - x distance of the label from the origin of the bookshelf
      y - y distance of the label from the origin of the bookshelf

    • getFreeSpace

      public int getFreeSpace(int column)
      It returns the number of free positions in the column
      Parameters:
      column - column
      Returns:
      integer representing how many tiles can be inserted in the column

      public boolean isFull(int column)
      It returns true if the column is full
      Parameters:
      column - column
      Returns:
      true if the column is full, false otherwise

      public void resetDepth()
